DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : All fetuses bilateral abnormal renal development ( structure modification parenchyma without urinary tract abnormality associate ) The follow sonographic criterion use : Fetal kidney size < 2.5ep < 2 standard deviation ( SD ) define renal hypoplasia renal size > 97.5ep > 2 SD define nephromegaly And / hyperechogenicity ( echogenic liver kidney ) And / cyst And / abnormal corticomedullary differentiation ( decrease lack thereof ) And / bilateral cortical thinning And / possibility initial unilateral renal disease case pathology kidney damage usually become bilateral evolution EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Foetuses severe malformation change amniotic urine proteome : complex heart disease , digestive stenosis , fetal immobility . Fetus whose mother chronic infectious disease ( HIV , hepatitis B C ) acute infectious disease chorioamnionitis . Parental Refusal .
